Package socialmedia

Class Endorsement

java.lang.Object
socialmedia.Post
socialmedia.Endorsement
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Endorsement
extends Post
The Endorsement class extends the superclass Post, this allows for a distinction between endorsements, original posts and comments when programming using these classes.
See Also:
